keyword: how many calories in a cuties
title: How Many Calories in a Cuties Mandarin?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a cuties mandarin orange, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per fruit.
h1: How Many Calories in a Cuties Mandarin?
assumptions: One medium Cuties clementine (~74 g), fresh, peeled and eaten; no added sugar or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, ripeness, variety, and growing conditions. Check labels or sources for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One Cuties mandarin orange has about 35 kcal and 1.3 g fiber.

label_note: Values align with Nutrition Facts labels for straightforward comparison.

tweaks.label: Sprinkle 1 tsp sugar on the segments
Eat with 1 oz low-fat yogurt dip
Juiced instead of eaten whole (lose some fiber)

faqs.q: How many calories in a cuties mandarin?
faqs.a: Approximately 35 kcal per medium Cuties clementine.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in one cuties?
faqs.a: About 8.9 g total carbs, including 1.3 g fiber and 7 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a cuties low in fat and protein?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.2 g fat and 0.6 g protein per fruit.

faqs.q: How does cuties compare to other oranges?
faqs.a: Similar to a small orange but lower calories (~35 vs. 60-80 for medium navel).

faqs.q: Are cuties good for fiber intake?
faqs.a: One provides 1.3 g fiber, about 5% of daily needs; great for a snack.
